title: Calling out May Peeps
body:
Time to talk smack like Sumac
With a misogynistic attack 
I respect a fellow writter
But your attire is wack

You sound a lot like Reinfox
With a chance of Rain 
I've been on gd long enough
to know how they play this game

Lesbian, victim complex, Summers' breeze
I'll force you Persophonys
To swallow my seeds 
Piss off Demeter to bring the winter
You can call me Hades

Excuse me, if you're a real lady
Had my Helm of Darkness on so long
Everything appears shady
I'm gonna keep you lumped with the rest of the bunch
Until you can prove you're Ms. Brady
